quote_last: Eric Hamblin, formerly of Sweetwater, Texas, had worked as a guard for SatCom for the past two and a half years and he loved the job. He was twenty-four, a college-dropout casualty of the go-go eighties who got to spend his afternoons hanging out on one of Greeceâ€™s most beautiful islands.
title: Project Cyclops
author: Thomas Hoover
